job_tasks.phrase: manage the delivery of high-quality software products and features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the responsibility of overseeing the creation and delivery of software.

job_tasks.phrase: lead our teams to achieve their goals
job_tasks.justification: Indicates leadership in the context of software development delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive the timely and successful delivery of software services
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the execution and completion of software-related tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the development and integration of GenAI components
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions leading the creation and integration of GenAI specific elements, which falls under model development.
Refers to the practical implementation and embedding of AI technologies into software.

job_tasks.phrase: integration of services into our product ecosystem
job_tasks.justification: Pertains to connecting and incorporating different software components within a larger product.

job_tasks.phrase: Regularly review and enhance our service offerings, keeping pace with industry advancements
job_tasks.justification: Implies continuous improvement and adaptation of AI-related services, which can involve model refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed about the latest GenAI technologies and approaches, assessing their relevance to enhance our services
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on understanding and evaluating new generative AI methods to improve offerings, which relates to model development and application.

soft_skills.phrase: commitment to learning on the job
ability to quickly assimilate new technologies
Stay informed about the latest GenAI technologies and approaches

classification.rationale: The job emphasizes leading the development and integration of GenAI components, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While it focuses on software delivery and doesn't explicitly mention fine-tuning or RAG, the role's direct involvement with GenAI technologies and their integration into products points strongly towards this profile.
